mapper.select: SELECT apply_idx, apply_id, apply_proj_id, apply_mem_id, mem_idx, mem_Sort, date_format(apply_reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS apply_reg_date, apply_Profile, apply_type, apply_proj_state, profile_photo, Profile_hashtag, Profile_intro, Profile_biz_sort, (SELECT mem_nick FROM MemList where mem_id = (SELECT proj_mem_id FROM ProjectList where proj_id = apply_proj_id)) as mem_nick, (SELECT mem_nick FROM MemList where mem_id = apply_mem_id) as apply_mem_nick, proj_id, proj_title, proj_state, date_format(proj_reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS proj_reg_date, proj_hit, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(CMMN_CODE_VALUE_KO_NM) FROM TB_CMMN_CODE WHERE CMMN_CODE_TY= 'A11' AND CMMN_CODE_VALUE IN ( IF(INSTR(Profile_ch,'1')=0,0,1), IF(INSTR(Profile_ch,'2')=0,0,2), IF(INSTR(Profile_ch,'3')=0,0,3), IF(INSTR(Profile_ch,'4')=0,0,4), IF(INSTR(Profile_ch,'5')=0,0,5), IF(INSTR(Profile_ch,'6')=0,0,6), IF(INSTR(Profile_ch,'7')=0,0,7) )) AS Profile_ch, Profile_volume, Mem_tel, (SELECT CMMN_CODE_VALUE_KO_NM FROM TB_CMMN_CODE WHERE CMMN_CODE_TY='A10' AND CMMN_CODE_VALUE=pf.Profile_career) AS Profile_career, TO_DAYS(proj_end_date)-TO_DAYS(now()) as proj_Day, date_format(proj_end_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as proj_end_date FROM ApplyList a, ProjectList p, MemList m, ProfileList pf WHERE 1=1 AND apply_mem_id = IFNULL(#{applyMemId},apply_mem_id) AND apply_proj_id = IFNULL(#{applyProjId},apply_proj_id) AND apply_type = IFNULL(#{applyType},apply_type) AND apply_proj_state = IFNULL(#{applyProjState},apply_proj_state) AND p.proj_id = a.Apply_proj_id AND a.apply_mem_id = m.mem_id AND a.apply_mem_id = pf.profile_mem_id ORDER BY proj_reg_date DESC

SELECT apply_idx, apply_id, apply_proj_id, apply_mem_id, apply_reg_date, apply_Profile, apply_type, apply_proj_state, mem_nick, profile_photo, Profile_hashtag FROM ApplyList a INNER JOIN ProjectList p ON p.proj_id = a.Apply_proj_id INNER JOIN MemList m ON a.apply_mem_id = m.mem_id INNER JOIN ProfileList pf ON a.apply_mem_id = pf.profile_mem_id where apply_proj_id = #{applyProjId}
mapper.update: UPDATE ApplyList SET Apply_proj_state = #{applyProjState}, Apply_update_date = now() WHERE Apply_id = #{applyId} AND Apply_proj_id = #{applyProjId} AND Apply_type = '2'
